name: Dead City: Roadkill
description:
It is fun. It is easy. It is smooth like silk. The environment is stunning. The vehicles you drive are awesome. The guns you shoot with have fire-power beyond your imagination. The zombies that you are up against are the most terrifying you have ever encountered. This game has it all. You will be addicted.

Dead city: road kill game is a 2-in-1 game of extreme driving simulation on roads streaming with zombies out to finish humanity mixed with Sniping Robots. Your missions are two-fold. As a Robot you have to shoot the zombies that are out to get you. And as a truck driver your mission is to drive the truck killing and crushing zombies that come in your path. The more you kill, the higher your score. In this Dead city: road kill game, you have the opportunity to kill the zombies as a Robot with a gun and as a skilled long vehicle transporter driver crushing the zombies on the Road. Just make sure you don’t crash the truck. Your mission is to transport the Robot to safety.

As a large vehicle transporter, you must have driving skills related to various aspects of driving like police vehicles and army transporter cargo trucks. This 3D simulator game will pump your adrenaline as you drive and shoot to rescue the city from zombies.

Drive your Robot transporter truck and enjoy an exciting drive on the roads filled with zombies making it look like a zombie highway. You just make sure you don’t crash the truck or your expensive Robot on the back of the truck ready to kill the zombies by shooting them with its futuristic gun. Your mission is to drive your truck crushing and killing the zombies on the zombie highway. You are a zombie hunter. Your other task is as a Robot to aim and kill the Zombies on the Zombie highway. It is like this dead city: Road kill is a game where you are on the zombie road trip to kill and hunt as many as you can. Once this is done you have to drive your truck and drop your precious cargo to parking lots of car showrooms and garages. These missions will give you the opportunity to showcase your heavy transport trailer driving skills.

Brazil, Indonesia, Philippines, Europe and USA have had a virus outbreak that is turning humans into zombies.
It is spreading fast. However there are certain Safe-zones that are now guarded by the transforming robots. The only mode of transportation are special military trucks. The survivors are fleeing the Brazilian cities going to the mountains of Europe that are less populated. Your mission is to drive the trucks and transport the transforming Robots to safe zones and in the meanwhile kill all the Zombies you can find. The people have are looking towards the specially trained truck drivers and Robots who have now become zombie assault snipers and crushers. They are depending on your speed, strength and skills to save the world. It is the last fortress and the last line of defense for this world against this zombie plague. this is the best Robots vs zombie game that you have played.

Features
• 2-in-1 hybrid truck driving simulation and Robot assault sniper game
• Real 3D environments
• Combat weapons
• Exciting and smooth game play
• Challenging time limit missions
• Realistic zombies and humans
• Multiple missions
• first-person intense 3D sniper assault action adventure
• choice of weapons
